page.title: 07THE COUNTY HOSPITAL,LINCOLN.
page.content: Phase 1 of the hospital was completed in{January 1985}and officially opened by the Princess of Wales on{23rd July {1985.}Phases{2}and{3}will be completed in{1991}and{ 2000.}The layout includes {10 }clinics grouped round a central courtyard, each clinic having a reception desk, waiting area and{ 2 examination rooms. The wards are L-shaped, holding{ 28}patients grouped in bays. At present there are{4}X-ray rooms and{ 8} operating theatres. The latter are situated above the A.S.D.U. unit so that dirty instruments descend by a chute,are sterilised and returned by a hoist. The regeneration room receives freshly cooked meals which are chilled and reheated for consumption within a period of{3}days. The record room contains extensive microfilm equipment. 5 telephonists control a large switchboard.
